scripts.watch:tests: dotnet fable watch tests -o dist/tests --runWatch mocha dist/tests -r esm
scripts.start: dotnet fable watch src/App --run webpack serve
scripts.watch:devtools: dotnet fable watch src/DevTools --runWatch webpack --config webpack.devtools.js
scripts.start:e: dotnet fable watch src/AppUsingEngine --run webpack serve --config webpack.e.js
scripts.build:e: dotnet fable       src/AppUsingEngine --run webpack --config webpack.e.js --mode production
